seo.title: Terms and Conditions - Vision Business | Loans and Financing DRC
seo.description: Vision Business terms and conditions. Discover our terms for personal loans, business loans and financial services in Democratic Republic of Congo.
seo.keywords: terms and conditions, loan terms, financing contract, Vision Business DRC, microfinance Congo, terms of use
seo.ogDescription: Terms of use for our loan and financing services in Democratic Republic of Congo

section1.title: Acceptance of terms
section1.content1: By accessing and using Vision Business services, you unconditionally accept these terms and conditions of use. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our services.
section1.content2: Vision Business reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be informed of important changes by email or via a notification on our platform.

section2.title: Services offered
section2.content: Vision Business offers the following financial services:
section2.businessLoans: Financing for small and medium enterprises
section2.footer: All services are subject to the approval of our credit committee and compliance with applicable regulations in the Democratic Republic of Congo.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: To be eligible for our loan services, you must meet the following conditions:
eligibility.residency: Reside in the Democratic Republic of Congo
eligibility.income: Have a regular and verifiable source of income
eligibility.documents: Provide required identification and supporting documents
eligibility.creditHistory: Have a satisfactory credit history or accept a solvency assessment

documents.title: Required documents
documents.content: Depending on the loan type, the following documents may be required:
documents.identity: Valid national ID card or passport
documents.address: Proof of address less than 3 months old
documents.income: Proof of income (pay slips, bank statements, tax declarations)
documents.business: For businesses: statutes, trade register, recent financial statements
documents.collateral: Documents related to proposed collateral if applicable

section4.title: User obligations
section4.content: By using our services, you commit to:
section4.accuracy: Provide accurate, complete and up-to-date information
section4.confidentiality: Maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials
section4.repayment: Strictly respect the agreed repayment deadlines
section4.communication: Inform Vision Business of any change in situation that may affect your repayment capacity
section4.fundsUsage: Use the loaned funds in accordance with the purpose declared in your application
section4.cooperation: Cooperate with Vision Business for any necessary verification

section5.title: Privacy and data protection
section5.content1: Vision Business is committed to protecting the confidentiality of your personal data in accordance with our privacy policy and data protection regulations.
section5.content2: Your data is used exclusively for:
section5.usage1: The study and processing of your loan application
section5.usage2: The management of your customer relationship and loan contract
section5.usage3: The improvement of our services and products
section5.usage4: Compliance with our legal and regulatory obligations

section6.title: Intellectual property
section6.content: All content, brands, logos and graphic elements of the Vision Business platform are the exclusive property of Vision Business and are protected by intellectual property laws.

section7.title: Liability limitations
section7.content: Vision Business cannot be held liable for indirect damages resulting from the use of its services. Vision Business's liability is limited to the amount of fees collected for the service concerned.

section8.title: Terms modifications
section8.content: Vision Business reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will take effect upon their publication on the platform. The user is deemed to have accepted the modifications by continuing to use the services.

section9.title: Applicable law and jurisdiction
section9.content1: These general terms and conditions are governed by the law of the Democratic Republic of Congo.
section9.content2: Any dispute relating to their interpretation or execution falls under the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Kinshasa, notwithstanding multiple defendants or call in guarantee.

questions.title: Questions about our terms?
questions.content: Our team is at your disposal for any question regarding our terms and conditions.

seo.title: Privacy Policy - Vision Business | Data Protection DRC
seo.description: Vision Business privacy policy. Discover how we protect your personal data in our financial services in Democratic Republic of Congo.
seo.keywords: data privacy, personal data protection, GDPR DRC, personal information, Vision Business security, privacy policy
seo.ogDescription: How we protect your personal data in our loan and financing services

section1.title: Introduction and scope
section1.content1: At Vision Business, the protection of your personal data is an absolute priority. This privacy policy describes how we collect, use, share and protect your information in the context of our financial services.
section1.content2: This policy applies to all services offered by Vision Business, including online loan applications, account management, and any interaction with our platform.

personalData.title: Personal data
personalData.identity: Identity information: name, first name, date of birth, ID document
personalData.financial: Financial information: income, employment, credit history
personalData.banking: Banking data: statements, IBAN, account information
personalData.technical: Technical data: IP address, logs, cookies

sensitiveData.title: Sensitive data
sensitiveData.content: In accordance with regulations, we do not collect sensitive data (racial origin, political opinions, religious beliefs, etc.) except for explicit legal obligation.

section3.title: Processing purposes
section3.content: Your data is used for the following purposes:

section4.title: Legal basis for processing
section4.content1: The processing of your data is based on the following legal grounds:
section4.legal1: Contract execution for providing our financial services
section4.legal2: Legal obligation regarding fraud and money laundering prevention

recipients.title: Data recipients
recipients.content: Your data may be shared with:

safeguards.title: Safeguards
safeguards.content: All our partners are contractually bound to respect security standards equivalent to ours and can only use your data for specified purposes.

section6.title: International transfers
section6.content1: Your data is mainly processed and stored in the Democratic Republic of Congo. In the exceptional case of international transfer, we ensure that:
section6.condition1: The country benefits from an adequacy decision
section6.condition3: Appropriate technical and organizational security measures are applied

section7.title: Data retention
section7.content1: We retain your data for the duration necessary for the purposes for which they were collected, in accordance with legal obligations:
section7.duration1: Prospect data: 3 years after last contact
section7.content2: After these periods, data is either archived in accordance with the law, anonymized for statistical studies, or securely destroyed.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.content: In accordance with data protection regulations, you have the following rights:
rights.erasure: Right to erasure ("right to be forgotten")

exercise.title: Exercising your rights
exercise.content: To exercise your rights, you can:
exercise.postal: Write to us at our headquarters postal address
exercise.response: We commit to respond within a maximum period of one month. In case of complexity, this period may be extended by two additional months.

section9.title: Data security
section9.content1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against any unauthorized access, modification, disclosure or destruction.

section10.title: Cookies and similar technologies
section10.content: We use cookies to improve your user experience, analyze traffic and personalize content. You can control cookies through your browser settings. Our detailed cookie policy is available in your account preferences.

section11.title: Policy modifications
section11.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy to reflect legal, regulatory or technical developments. Important modifications will be notified to you by email or via a prominent notice on our platform.

questions.title: Questions about privacy?
questions.content: Our Data Protection Officer (DPO) is at your disposal for any question regarding the protection of your personal data.

seo.title: Regulatory Compliance - Vision Business | Financial Regulation DRC
seo.description: Vision Business regulatory compliance policy. Discover our commitment for transparent and compliant financial services in Democratic Republic of Congo.
seo.keywords: regulatory compliance, financial regulation, BCC DRC, anti-fraud, KYC, AML, Vision Business compliance, AML-CFT
seo.ogDescription: Our commitment for transparent financial services compliant with DRC regulations

compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
compliance.subtitle: Our commitment for transparent and compliant financial services

section1.title: Compliance commitment
section1.content1: Vision Business places regulatory compliance at the heart of its activities. We are committed to strictly respect all applicable laws and regulations in the financial sector in Democratic Republic of Congo.
section1.content2: Our compliance program is supervised by an independent Compliance Officer who reports directly to the Board of Directors.

regulations.title: Applicable regulations
regulations.content: Our activities are governed by the following main regulations:
regulations.law1: Law on credit institutions and financial establishments
regulations.law2: Regulations of the Central Bank of Congo (BCC)
regulations.law3: Law on anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing

supervision.title: Supervision
supervision.content: Vision Business is supervised by the Central Bank of Congo (BCC) and undergoes regular inspections to ensure compliance with our regulatory obligations.

amlPolicy.title: AML-CFT Policy
amlPolicy.content: Our anti-money laundering and counter-terrorism financing policy includes:

obligations.title: Vigilance obligations
obligations.content: We are required to know our customers, monitor their transactions, retain documents for 5 years, and report any suspicious operation to the National Financial Intelligence Processing Unit (CENTIF).

section4.title: KYC Compliance
section4.content: Our "Know Your Customer" (KYC) process includes three levels of diligence:
section4.kyc2: Standard diligence for majority of customers
section4.kyc3: Enhanced diligence for high-risk customers (PEP, sensitive sectors)
section4.footer: We systematically verify the identity, address, professional activity and source of funds of our customers.

section5.title: Consumer protection
section5.content1: We are committed to providing clear, complete and transparent information to our customers:
section5.protection1: Transparent communication of rates and fees
section5.protection3: Respect of right of withdrawal when applicable

section6.title: Ethics and integrity
section6.content1: All Vision Business employees are required to respect our Code of Ethics and Conduct which includes:

section7.title: Monitoring and reporting
section7.content: Our monitoring system includes regular internal audits, automated transaction controls, and quarterly reports to the Board of Directors on compliance matters.

section8.title: Training and awareness
section8.content: All employees receive mandatory annual training on regulatory compliance, anti-money laundering, and data protection. Commercial teams benefit from additional training on consumer protection.

section9.title: Irregularity reporting
section9.content1: We encourage the reporting of any irregularity or unethical behavior through our dedicated and confidential channel.
section9.content2: Reports can be made anonymously and are protected against retaliation in accordance with our whistleblower protection policy.

questions.title: Questions about compliance?
questions.content: Our compliance team is at your disposal for any question regarding our regulatory policies and procedures.
